title: Action VFX Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Action sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/V2VwgOwQ-Ls


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 60 FPS 


Texture Resolutions:


● Action 01_#[512,288].png 5632x3456

● Action 02_#[512,288].png 5120x3456

● Action 03_#[512,288].png 8192x4896

● Action 04_#[512,288].png 6656x4032

● Action 05_#[512,288].png 5632x3456

● Action 06_#[512,288].png 6656x4320

● Action 07_#[512,288].png 5120x3456

● Action 08_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Action 09_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Action 10_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Action 11_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● Action 12_#[512,288].png 6144x3744


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
